llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: frontend-policy
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: loadgenerator
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: user
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
  egress:
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkout
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: recommendation
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalog
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cart
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shipping
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currency
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: email
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
EOF
